text:
SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.enriched.json
READS:
- option header
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/bronze/orders/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- df1
- out
- spark
- src

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: order_ts
EXPRESSION: F.to_timestamp('order_ts')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['order_ts']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: order_date
EXPRESSION: F.to_date('order_ts')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['order_ts']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: customer_id
EXPRESSION: F.col('customer_id').cast('string')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['customer_id']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: order_id
EXPRESSION: F.col('order_id').cast('string')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['order_id']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: amount
EXPRESSION: F.coalesce(F.col('amount').cast('double'), F.lit(0.0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['amount']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: currency
EXPRESSION: F.upper(F.coalesce(F.col('currency'), F.lit('USD')))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['currency']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: channel
EXPRESSION: F.lower(F.coalesce(F.col('channel'), F.lit('unknown')))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['channel']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: country
EXPRESSION: F.upper(F.coalesce(F.col('country'), F.lit('US')))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['country']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: is_refund
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('amount') < 0, F.lit(1)).otherwise(F.lit(0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['amount']

SCRIPT: script_01_bronze_ingest_orders.py
DATAFRAME: df1
DERIVED_COLUMN: abs_amount
EXPRESSION: F.abs(F.col('amount'))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['amount']

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_02_dim_customer_latest.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/raw/customers/
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_customer/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- df2
- out
- spark
- src
- w

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: email_domain
EXPRESSION: F.lower(F.regexp_extract(F.col('email'), '@(.+)$', 1))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['email']

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: customer_tier
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('lifetime_value') >= 10000, 'platinum').when(F.col('lifetime_value') >= 5000, 'gold').when(F.col('lifetime_value') >= 1000,'silver').otherwise('bronze')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['lifetime_value']

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: drnk
EXPRESSION: F.dense_rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: rnk
EXPRESSION: F.rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_02_dim_customer_latest.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: rn
EXPRESSION: F.row_number().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/bronze/orders/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_customer/
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_enriched/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- df2
- dim_cust
- orders
- out
- spark
- w

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: prev_amount
EXPRESSION: F.lag('abs_amount', 1).over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: next_amount
EXPRESSION: F.lead('abs_amount', 1).over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: amount_delta_prev
EXPRESSION: F.col('abs_amount') - F.coalesce(F.col('prev_amount'), F.lit(0.0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount', 'prev_amount']

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: rolling_7_orders_sum
EXPRESSION: F.sum('abs_amount').over(w.rowsBetween(-6, 0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: rolling_30_orders_sum
EXPRESSION: F.sum('abs_amount').over(w.rowsBetween(-29, 0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_03_fact_orders_enriched.py
RESULT_DF: df
JOIN: orders left JOIN dim_cust
ON: ['customer_id']

SCRIPT: script_04_dim_product_sql_cte.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_04_dim_product_sql_cte.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/raw/products/
WRITES:
- df=df -> createOrReplaceTempView raw_products
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_product/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- dim_prod
- out
- spark
- sql
- src

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_05_sales_margin_rank.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_enriched/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_product/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/raw/order_items/
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/sales_margin_ranked/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- df2
- dim_prod
- fact
- line_items
- out
- spark
- w

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: gross_sales
EXPRESSION: F.col('f.abs_amount')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: qty
EXPRESSION: F.coalesce(F.col('qty').cast('int'), F.lit(1))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: est_cost
EXPRESSION: F.col('qty') * F.coalesce(F.col('p.cost'), F.lit(0.0))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: est_margin
EXPRESSION: F.col('gross_sales') - F.col('est_cost')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: est_margin_pct
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('gross_sales') == 0, F.lit(None)).otherwise(F.col('est_margin') / F.col('gross_sales'))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: margin_rank_day
EXPRESSION: F.rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: margin_dense_rank_day
EXPRESSION: F.dense_rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: top_10_flag
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('margin_rank_day') <= 10, 1).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
RESULT_DF: df
JOIN: f inner JOIN i
ON: ['order_id']

SCRIPT: script_05_sales_margin_rank.py
RESULT_DF: df
JOIN: df left JOIN p
ON: ['product_id']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_06_web_sessionization.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/raw/web_clicks/
WRITES:
- df=df6 -> createOrReplaceTempView sessions
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/web_sessions/
DATAFRAMES:
- agg_sql
- clicks
- df
- df2
- df3
- df4
- df5
- df6
- out
- sess_agg
- spark
- w

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: ref_host
EXPRESSION: F.regexp_extract(F.col('referrer'), 'https?://([^/]+)/', 1)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['referrer']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: url_host
EXPRESSION: F.regexp_extract(F.col('url'), 'https?://([^/]+)/', 1)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['url']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: event_date
EXPRESSION: F.to_date('event_ts')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: event_ts
EXPRESSION: F.to_timestamp('event_ts')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: prev_ts
EXPRESSION: F.lag('event_ts').over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df3
DERIVED_COLUMN: gap_min
EXPRESSION: (F.col('event_ts').cast('long') - F.col('prev_ts').cast('long')) / 60.0
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts', 'prev_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df4
DERIVED_COLUMN: new_session_flag
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('gap_min').isNull() | (F.col('gap_min') > 30), 1).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['gap_min']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df5
DERIVED_COLUMN: session_num
EXPRESSION: F.sum('new_session_flag').over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['new_session_flag']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: df6
DERIVED_COLUMN: session_id
EXPRESSION: F.concat_ws('-', F.col('customer_id'), F.col('event_date'), F.col('session_num'))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['customer_id', 'event_date', 'session_num']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: sess_agg
AGGREGATION: MIN(event_ts) AS session_start_ts
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: sess_agg
AGGREGATION: MAX(event_ts) AS session_end_ts
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['event_ts']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: sess_agg
AGGREGATION: COUNT(1) AS events
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['*']

SCRIPT: script_06_web_sessionization.py
DATAFRAME: sess_agg
AGGREGATION: COUNT(DISTINCT url_host) AS unique_hosts
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['url_host']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_07_fraud_scoring.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_enriched/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/web_sessions/
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_risk_scored/
DATAFRAMES:
- df
- df2
- fact
- out
- sessions
- spark
- w

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: high_value_flag
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('f.abs_amount') >= 500, 1).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['f.abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_from_channel
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('f.channel').isin('unknown', 'affiliate'), 2).when(F.col('f.channel') == 'web', 1).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['f.channel']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_from_refund
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('f.is_refund') == 1, 3).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['f.is_refund']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_from_sessions
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('s.events') >= 50, 2).when(F.col('s.events') >= 20, 1).otherwise(0)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['s.events']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df
DERIVED_COLUMN: raw_risk_score
EXPRESSION: F.col('high_value_flag') + F.col('risk_from_channel') + F.col('risk_from_refund') + F.col('risk_from_sessions')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['high_value_flag', 'risk_from_channel', 'risk_from_refund', 'risk_from_sessions']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_rank_day
EXPRESSION: F.rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_percent_rank_day
EXPRESSION: F.percent_rank().over(w)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
DATAFRAME: df2
DERIVED_COLUMN: risk_bucket
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('risk_percent_rank_day') >= 0.99, 'critical').when(F.col('risk_percent_rank_day') >= 0.95, 'high').when(F.col('risk_percent_rank_day') >= 0.8,'medium').otherwise('low')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['risk_percent_rank_day']

SCRIPT: script_07_fraud_scoring.py
RESULT_DF: df
JOIN: f left JOIN s
ON: ['f.customer_id = s.customer_id']

SCRIPT: script_08_delta_merge_scd1_customer.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_08_delta_merge_scd1_customer.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_customer/
WRITES:
- df=save -> save s3a://my-bucket/delta/dim_customer_scd1/
DATAFRAMES:
- spark
- target_path
- tgt
- updates

SCRIPT: script_08_delta_merge_scd1_customer.py
RESULT_DF: t
JOIN: t inner JOIN s
ON: ['customer_id']

SCRIPT: script_09_sql_merge_inventory.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_09_sql_merge_inventory.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/raw/inventory_updates/
WRITES:
- df=inv -> createOrReplaceTempView inv_updates
- df=spark -> sql 
      CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS delta_inventory
      USING delta
      LOCATION 's3a://my-bucket/delta/inventory/'
    
- df=spark -> sql 
      MERGE INTO delta_inventory t
      USING inv_updates s
      ON t.sku = s.sku AND t.warehouse = s.warehouse
      WHEN MATCHED AND s.updated_at >= t.updated_at THEN
        UPDATE SET
          t.on_hand = s.on_hand,
          t.updated_at = s.updated_at
      WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
        INSERT (sku, warehouse, on_hand, updated_at)
        VALUES (s.sku, s.warehouse, s.on_hand, s.updated_at)
    
DATAFRAMES:
- inv
- spark

SCRIPT: script_09_sql_merge_inventory.py
DATAFRAME: inv
DERIVED_COLUMN: updated_at
EXPRESSION: F.to_timestamp('updated_at')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: []

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_10_mart_customer_value.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_enriched/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/fact_orders_risk_scored/
- parquet s3a://my-bucket/silver/dim_customer/
WRITES:
- df=orders -> createOrReplaceTempView orders
- df=risk -> createOrReplaceTempView risk
- df=cust -> createOrReplaceTempView cust
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://my-bucket/gold/mart_customer_value/
DATAFRAMES:
- cust
- mart
- orders
- out
- risk
- spark
- sql

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: sql
DERIVED_COLUMN: net_spend
EXPRESSION: (cr.total_spend - cr.total_refunds)
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['total_spend', 'total_refunds']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: sql
DERIVED_COLUMN: customer_segment
EXPRESSION: CASE WHEN cr.total_spend >= 10000 AND cr.ever_high_risk = 0 THEN 'VIP_SAFE' WHEN cr.total_spend >= 10000 AND cr.ever_high_risk = 1 THEN 'VIP_RISK' WHEN cr.total_spend >= 2000 THEN 'HIGH_VALUE' ELSE 'STANDARD' END
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['total_spend', 'ever_high_risk']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: daily
AGGREGATION: SUM(abs_amount) AS daily_spend
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: daily
AGGREGATION: SUM(CASE WHEN is_refund = 1 THEN abs_amount ELSE 0 END) AS daily_refund_amt
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['is_refund', 'abs_amount']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: daily
AGGREGATION: MAX(raw_risk_score) AS max_risk_score_day
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['raw_risk_score']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: daily
AGGREGATION: MAX(CASE WHEN risk_bucket IN ('critical','high') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS any_high_risk_day
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['risk_bucket']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: customer_rollup
AGGREGATION: SUM(daily_spend) AS total_spend
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['daily_spend']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: customer_rollup
AGGREGATION: SUM(daily_refund_amt) AS total_refunds
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['daily_refund_amt']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: customer_rollup
AGGREGATION: AVG(daily_spend) AS avg_daily_spend
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['daily_spend']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: customer_rollup
AGGREGATION: MAX(max_risk_score_day) AS max_risk_score
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['max_risk_score_day']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
DATAFRAME: customer_rollup
AGGREGATION: MAX(any_high_risk_day) AS ever_high_risk
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['any_high_risk_day']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
RESULT_DF: base
JOIN: orders left JOIN risk
ON: ['order_id']

SCRIPT: script_10_mart_customer_value.py
RESULT_DF: sql
JOIN: cust left JOIN customer_rollup
ON: ['customer_id']

SCRIPT: script_a_customer_agg.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_a_customer_agg.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://mybucket/landing/customer_landing.parquet
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://mybucket/curated/customer_agg/
DATAFRAMES:
- df1
- dfAgg
- dfCurated

SCRIPT: script_a_customer_agg.py
DATAFRAME: dfAgg
DERIVED_COLUMN: big_amount
EXPRESSION: col('total_amount') + col('total_revenue')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['total_amount', 'total_revenue']

SCRIPT: script_a_customer_agg.py
DATAFRAME: df1
AGGREGATION: sum(amount) AS total_amount
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['amount']

SCRIPT: script_a_customer_agg.py
DATAFRAME: df1
AGGREGATION: sum(revenue) AS total_revenue
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['revenue']

SCRIPT: script_b_join_products.py
SOURCE_FILE: script_b_join_products.enriched.json
READS:
- parquet s3a://mybucket/curated/customer_agg/
- parquet s3a://mybucket/ref/products.parquet
WRITES:
- df=parquet -> parquet s3a://mybucket/stage/cust_products/
DATAFRAMES:
- df3
- dfJoined
- dfProducts
- dfStage

SCRIPT: script_b_join_products.py
DATAFRAME: dfStage
DERIVED_COLUMN: margin
EXPRESSION: F.col('big_amount') - F.col('price')
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['big_amount', 'price']

SCRIPT: script_b_join_products.py
DATAFRAME: dfStage
DERIVED_COLUMN: is_profitable
EXPRESSION: F.when(F.col('margin') > 0, F.lit(True)).otherwise(F.lit(False))
SOURCE_COLUMNS: ['margin']

SCRIPT: script_b_join_products.py
RESULT_DF: dfJoined
JOIN: df3 left JOIN dfProducts
ON: ['product_id']
